name: droning loop 004: grounding (DABF)
description: Recorded and created by Gustavo Paim aka @colapsismo. For buyers, since H=N only allows 40MB, I can send the original files. Contact me: gustavohpaim@gmail.com. This is the fourth of my Droning Loop series, a repetitive chord feedback composition for electric bass. Low sounds move slower, resonate with bigger surfaces, hit us in the center of the body, displace the sovereignty of the head/brain as receptors of sound to the whole body. Low sounds invite us to a more patient immersion.
